details.sectionContent: Use your instinct to bet, principles of house planning to plan the perfect town.

Build On Stakes is based on the principles of house Planning. The objective of the contest is to prepare a well planned Town, based on the principles of house Planning. In the first round participants will get a chance to collect the money as possible based on a round bet it! With the money earned from the first round the participants have to buy all the house planning materials with a price tag on them. Then participants can plan their own house with the different elements of the amenities which they have bought. Then the model of town planning judge by the judges and best one will be declared as a winner.

Betting: In betting contests every team have to start with zero balance. They have to bet the amount on the clips shown to them. We will show 4 video clips. Accordingly from their bet they will gain or lose the amount. That gained or loosed amount will be added to their base amount or subtracted their base amount respectively.

In this round the participants have to build a Zenga. Only one chance is given to the participants if they fail to build the Zenga 1st time. After this elimination will be done on the basis of 1st and 2nd round. Only 10 Teams will proceed to third round.

The teams can use only the elements bought by the money they had earned earlier in the first and second round. The teams are not allowed to use any other element for the planning of house except those provided to them and won in second round. The teams are themselves responsible for any damage caused to the house before the judging process. The judging criteria will be based on:The judgment will be fully based on the principles of house planning. The final decision will be of the judges.
